title: Post Game with Pat McCrory: “I never thought Republicans would hide from debate”
description: Pat McCrory (R), former Governor of North Carolina, talks to Chuck about the Republican Senate primary that he recently lost and changes within the Republican party.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Pat McCrory (R), former Governor of North Carolina, talks to Chuck about the Republican Senate primary that he recently lost and changes within the Republican party.
